name: Restless Memory
description:
A narrative game telling mainly done through inferrence. Also this is a school project, I've been on a game design course for 2 years, this being the final project. Hope you enjoy, it's been (kinda) fun making games, but this is probably the last game I make... This was created by 3 other people who assisted with the programming and some of the visuals and all of the sounds.

To download the game (which is much better) 

Time to move onto what I actually care about, animation
